alert.note: Alert for Aibonito; Arroyo; Cayey; Coamo; Guayama; Juana Diaz; Ponce; Salinas; Santa Isabel; Villalba (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 18 at 6:19PM ADT until September 19 at 12:15AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Aibonito County in Puerto Rico... Arroyo County in Puerto Rico... Cayey County in Puerto Rico... Coamo County in Puerto Rico... Guayama County in Puerto Rico... Juana Diaz County in Puerto Rico... Ponce County in Puerto Rico... Salinas County in Puerto Rico... Santa Isabel County in Puerto Rico... Villalba County in Puerto Rico... * Until 1115 PM AST. * At 519 PM AST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 8 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 6 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of rivers, creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Rapid rises along rivers and streams continue. Mudslides and rockfall will remain likely in areas of steep terrain. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Ponce, Guayama, Coamo, Santa Isabel, Salinas, Villalba, Juana Diaz, Aibonito, Cayey, Arroyo, Los Llanos, Las Ollas, Jauca, Coco, Guayabal, Vazquez, Potala Pastillo, Luis Llorens Torres, Aguilita and Coqui. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.

area.areaDesc: Aibonito; Arroyo; Cayey; Coamo; Guayama; Juana Diaz; Ponce; Salinas; Santa Isabel; Villalba
